text: Benjamin Neeb Habib (, romanised: Benyamin Nab Habib; born 7 June 1965) is a British-Pakistani politician and businessman who was the 2nd Deputy Leader of Reform UK serving alongside David Bull under Richard Tice and Nigel Farage from 2023 to July 2024. He was elected as a Member of the European Parliament or London in the 2019 European parliamentary election. He remained in the role until the United Kingdom's withdrawal from the EU on 31 January 2020. Habib is the chief executive of First Property Group, a commercial property investment and fund management company. ==Other websites== * European Parliament Page Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from London
title: Ben Habib
